item.title: Project Server 2013/Online - Customise Track your work WebPart tile colour using CSS
item.description: In Project Server 2013/Online, there is Track Your Work WebPart which can be added to a page. The composed look can be updated to change the colour of the tiles. If each tile needs a different colour, custom css needs to be used. Copy and paste the css code below into a content editor WebPart. /* —- #64D9E9 –> Light Blue /* —- #FFDE7B –> Yellow /* —- #D467A3 –> Pink /* —- #FF6685 –> Red /*—- #FF0033 –> Carmine red /* —- #A995C1 –> Purple /* —- #97D4A3 –> Green /* —- #667F97 –> Dark Blue /*————————————————————————-*/ /*————————————————————————-*/ /* ———– Change the color of the tiles ——————– Adding more colors change the 7n to 8n, etc to continue adding colors */ div.
